channel.title: Dragon Age
channel.description:
Has anybody played any of the series? I snatched the ultimate edition of Origins a while back on Steam and overall it's a fun game. I think it would be pretty awesome with co-op. Thoughts on the series/a specific game? Who is your favorite character? How many hours do you have in game so far?
Anybody pre-ordered inquisition yet?

item.title: Dragon Age
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:5, topic:543360”]i made the mistake of buying origins for ps3 it was so shitty i’ve never touched the series since.[/quote]I admit the console versions of the game needs a lot of improvement. If you ever get a chance/or get your own copy I suggest to try it on the PC the gameplay with pausing feature is totally different and makes you the ultimate tactician.

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon Age
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

[quote=“Pure_, post:4, topic:543360”]I didn’t enjoy the mechanics, didn’t play past the first minute.[/quote]that’s the complaint from all my friends who have played it; personally, i like that style of game play ever since i played KOtoR.

Read full topic

I didn’t enjoy the mechanics, didn’t play past the first minute.

item.title: Dragon Age
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

Loved the first game, the game play was simple and the story line kept you interested. Didn’t like how after finishing the last quest line you couldn’t play anymore, was a disappointment. I spent roughly 30 hours playing i think, between trying to finish the story line and getting the characters to like me.

I heard the second game was terrible, though i haven’t played it. However, apparently the newest one coming out will be amazing.

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon Age
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

it was fun for awhile, then i lost interest; however, bought the ultimate awhile back i had fun with the dlcs. again though, got boring.
